text: why backup to the AWS cloud in today's
market capturing preserving and
analyzing data is critical to your
competitive advantage but protecting
yourself from data loss events such as
natural disasters threat actors and
systems failures is increasingly
difficult as data stores expand and
outpace on-premises backup technologies
that are unable to cost-effectively and
securely flex and scale with your needs
to manage this complex problem many are
extending and replacing their
on-premises capabilities with
cloud-based backup which reduces tape
costs improves restore times and offers
innovative use cases for data archives
cloud backup is also a logical first
step for companies considering cloud
migration AWS can help we offer the most
data transfer methods and services for
virtually any backup use case such as
virtual tape archiving and disaster
recovery AWS also supports the largest
ecosystem of storage service partners
though customers can work with the same
providers they did on-premises and keep
existing systems and processes in place
to learn more go to AWS backup and
restore
